title: Milkshake
info: The Milkshake is a food item that drops from Icy Mermen and Ice Tortoises with a 1.33% chance and grants the Exquisitely Stuffed buff when consumed. This lasts for 16 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon () or by double-tapping the buff icon ().
stat:

Use time17 (Very fast)
